backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access control, user profiles, projects, tasks, preferences, and related utility types and state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing PWA, service worker, and manifest requirements with associated files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing roles of key frontend React components, hooks, styles, and views.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry defining PWA meta tags, icons, manifest reference, and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, colors, start behavior, and icon assets including proper 32, 192, and 512 PNGs.
frontend/public/service-worker.ts: Custom service worker implementing precaching, runtime caching, navigation fallback, and exclusions for canister API calls.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication, routing between calendar and project views, dark theme, and service worker registration.
frontend/src/components/CreateProjectDia: Dialog component for creating a project with name, icon, and color selection and form submission via useCreateProject.
frontend/src/components/CreateTaskDialog: Dialog for creating a task with fields for title, description, date, project, and priority, submitting through useCreateTask.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Displays empty-state UI for no projects or tasks, optionally showing a create-project dialog launcher.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: App header providing navigation, date controls, view switching, user menu, and mobile drawer handling.
frontend/src/components/HistoryPage.tsx: Displays searchable, sorted list of completed tasks with project info and task selection callback.
frontend/src/components/InstallPrompt.ts: Manages and displays PWA install prompts, handling browser and iOS install flows and user dismissal.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Renders a branded login screen with marketing features and an Internet Identity login button.
frontend/src/components/LongFormTaskEdit: Provides a rich text editor for long-form task descriptions using ReactQuill.
frontend/src/components/MainContent.tsx: Switches between day, week, and month calendar views based on the current view mode.
frontend/src/components/OverviewPage.tsx: Displays productivity insights and project statistics with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for entering and saving a user's display name on first setup.
frontend/src/components/ProjectsOverview: Shows all projects, supports expansion, deletion, and creation, and lists associated tasks.
frontend/src/components/TaskCard.tsx: Displays a task card with completion toggle, edit and delete actions, and optional selection handling.
frontend/src/components/TaskDrawer.tsx: Side drawer listing active tasks with search, quick-add, and task selection, using project lookups and task-creation mutations.
frontend/src/components/TaskEditDialog.t: Dialog for editing a task’s title, description, due date, project, and priority, submitting updates via mutations.
frontend/src/components/TaskPage.tsx: Full-page task editor supporting title, content, due date, priority, project changes, and saving via API mutations.
frontend/src/components/views/DayView.ts: Daily task view grouping overdue, upcoming, and completed tasks, with sorting, selection, and task creation.
Monthly calendar rendering tasks per day, with priority sorting, overdue indicators, day navigation, and task creation.
frontend/src/components/views/WeekView.t: Weekly grid view showing tasks per day with overdue detection, sorting, selection, and task creation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend tasks, projects, and user profile using the authenticated actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles and custom theme variables, plus styling for scrollbars and a rich‑text editor.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App bootstrap that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, and plugins including typography and container queries.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite configuration enabling React, aliasing, custom service worker output, and dev server settings.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata and requirements focused on completing PWA support and fixing service worker and manifest issues.
